articles.title: Afghanistan vs South Africa – T20 World Cup semifinal: Weather, pitch, toss - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Afghanistan face unbeaten South Africa with ‘nothing to lose’ but will be eyeing more history in the T20 World Cup 2024.
articles.content: Who: Afghanistan vs South AfricaWhat: ICC T20 World Cup 2024 semifinalWhen: Wednesday, June 26, 8:30pm local time (00:30 GMT, June 27)Where: Brian Lara Cricket Academy, San Fernando, Trinidad and Tob… [+6872 chars]

articles.title: Indians In Kenya Asked To Limit "Non-Essential" Movement Amid Violent Protests - NDTV
articles.description: India has advised its citizens in Kenya to exercise utmost caution and restrict non-essential movement amid violent protests in the East African nation against the government's proposed tax hikes.
articles.content:
At least five protestors were shot dead and more than 200 others injured in Nairobi. (File)
